atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Outputs the Tailwind CSS utility classes, preflight, or other foundational CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Apply utility classes as part of a CSS rule.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Used to wrap your own components and utilities with the same specificity as their corresponding Tailwind layers.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Converts a Tailwind config screen name to a CSS media query.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Generates responsive variants of your own CSS.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Generates pseudo-class variants of your own CSS.
